00054 #define DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE 2048 /* page size to store the BFS queue element type */
00055 #define DEFAULT_NODE_DIST_PAGE_SIZE 2048 /*  page sizesto store NodeDist_t type */
00056 #define MAXSHORTINT     ((DdHalfWord) ~0) /* constant defined to store
00057                                            * maximum distance of a node
00058                                            * from the root or the
00059                                            * constant
00060                                            */
00061 #define INITIAL_PAGES 128 /* number of initial pages for the
00062                            * queue/NodeDist_t type */
00063

00065 /* Stucture declarations                                                     */

00068 /* structure created to store subset results for each node and distances with 
00069  * odd and even parity of the node from the root and sink. Main data structure
00070  * in this procedure.
00071  */
00072 struct NodeDist{
00073     DdHalfWord oddTopDist;
00074     DdHalfWord evenTopDist;
00075     DdHalfWord oddBotDist;
00076     DdHalfWord evenBotDist;
00077     DdNode *regResult;
00078     DdNode *compResult;
00079 };
00080 
00081 /* assorted information needed by the BuildSubsetBdd procedure. */
00082 struct AssortedInfo {
00083     unsigned int maxpath;
00084     int findShortestPath;
00085     int thresholdReached;
00086     st_table *maxpathTable;
00087     int threshold;
00088 };

00155 
00184 DdNode *
00185 Cudd_SubsetShortPaths(
00186   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00187   DdNode * f /* function to be subset */,
00188   int  numVars /* number of variables in the support of f */,
00189   int  threshold /* maximum number of nodes in the subset */,
00190   int  hardlimit /* flag: 1 if threshold is a hard limit */)
00191 {
00192     DdNode *subset;
00193 
00194     memOut = 0;
00195     do {
00196         dd->reordered = 0;
00197         subset = cuddSubsetShortPaths(dd, f, numVars, threshold, hardlimit);
00198     } while((dd->reordered ==1) && (!memOut));
00199 
00200     return(subset);
00201 
00202 } /* end of Cudd_SubsetShortPaths */

00204 
00236 DdNode *
00237 Cudd_SupersetShortPaths(
00238   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00239   DdNode * f /* function to be superset */,
00240   int  numVars /* number of variables in the support of f */,
00241   int  threshold /* maximum number of nodes in the subset */,
00242   int  hardlimit /* flag: 1 if threshold is a hard limit */)
00243 {
00244     DdNode *subset, *g;
00245 
00246     g = Cudd_Not(f);
00247     memOut = 0;
00248     do {
00249         dd->reordered = 0;
00250         subset = cuddSubsetShortPaths(dd, g, numVars, threshold, hardlimit);
00251     } while((dd->reordered ==1) && (!memOut));
00252 
00253     return(Cudd_NotCond(subset, (subset != NULL)));
00254 
00255 } /* end of Cudd_SupersetShortPaths */

00262 
00280 DdNode *
00281 cuddSubsetShortPaths(
00282   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
00283   DdNode * f /* function to be subset */,
00284   int  numVars /* total number of variables in consideration */,
00285   int  threshold /* maximum number of nodes allowed in the subset */,
00286   int  hardlimit /* flag determining whether thershold should be respected strictly */)
00287 {
00288     st_table *pathTable;
00289     DdNode *N, *subset;
00290 
00291     unsigned int  *pathLengthArray;
00292     unsigned int maxpath, oddLen, evenLen, pathLength, *excess;
00293     int i;
00294     NodeDist_t  *nodeStat;
00295     struct AssortedInfo *info;
00296     st_table *subsetNodeTable;
00297 
00298     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00299     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00300 
00301     if (numVars == 0) {
00302       /* set default value */
00303       numVars = Cudd_ReadSize(dd);
00304     }
00305     
00306     if (threshold > numVars) {
00307         threshold = threshold - numVars;
00308     }
00309     if (f == NULL) {
00310         fprintf(stderr, "Cannot partition, nil object\n");
00311         return(NULL);
00312     }
00313     if (Cudd_IsConstant(f))
00314         return (f);
00315 
00316     pathLengthArray = ALLOC(unsigned int, numVars+1);
00317     for (i = 0; i < numVars+1; i++) pathLengthArray[i] = 0;
00318 
00319 
00320 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00321     numCalls = 0;
00322 #endif
00323 
00324     pathTable = CreatePathTable(f, pathLengthArray);
00325 
00326     if ((pathTable == NULL) || (memOut)) {
00327         if (pathTable != NULL)
00328             st_free_table(pathTable);
00329         FREE(pathLengthArray);
00330         return (NIL(DdNode));
00331     }
00332 
00333     excess = ALLOC(unsigned int, 1);
00334     *excess = 0;
00335     maxpath = AssessPathLength(pathLengthArray, threshold, numVars, excess);
00336 
00337     if (maxpath != (unsigned) (numVars + 1)) {
00338 
00339         info = ALLOC(struct AssortedInfo, 1);
00340         info->maxpath = maxpath;
00341         info->findShortestPath = 0;
00342         info->thresholdReached = *excess;
00343         info->maxpathTable = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00344         info->threshold = threshold;
00345 
00346 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00347         fprintf(stdout, "Path length array\n");
00348         for (i = 0; i < (numVars+1); i++) {
00349             if (pathLengthArray[i])
00350                 fprintf(stdout, "%d ",i);
00351         }
00352         fprintf(stdout, "\n");
00353         for (i = 0; i < (numVars+1); i++) {
00354             if (pathLengthArray[i])
00355                 fprintf(stdout, "%d ",pathLengthArray[i]);
00356         }
00357         fprintf(stdout, "\n");
00358         fprintf(stdout, "Maxpath  = %d, Thresholdreached = %d\n", maxpath,
00359                info->thresholdReached);
00360 #endif
00361 
00362         N = Cudd_Regular(f);
00363         if (!st_lookup(pathTable, (char *)N, (char **)&nodeStat)) {
00364             fprintf(stderr, "Something wrong, root node must be in table \n");
00365             exit(-1);
00366         } else {
00367             if ((nodeStat->oddTopDist != MAXSHORTINT) &&
00368                 (nodeStat->oddBotDist != MAXSHORTINT))
00369                 oddLen = (nodeStat->oddTopDist + nodeStat->oddBotDist);
00370             else
00371                 oddLen = MAXSHORTINT;
00372 
00373             if ((nodeStat->evenTopDist != MAXSHORTINT) &&
00374                 (nodeStat->evenBotDist != MAXSHORTINT))
00375                 evenLen = (nodeStat->evenTopDist +nodeStat->evenBotDist);
00376             else
00377                 evenLen = MAXSHORTINT;
00378 
00379             pathLength = (oddLen <= evenLen) ? oddLen : evenLen;
00380             if (pathLength > maxpath) {
00381                 fprintf(stderr, "All computations are bogus, since root has path length greater than max path length within threshold %d, %d\n", maxpath, pathLength);
00382 
00383                 exit(-1);
00384             }
00385         }
00386 
00387 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00388         numCalls = 0;
00389         hits = 0;
00390         thishit = 0;
00391 #endif
00392         /* initialize a table to store computed nodes */
00393         if (hardlimit) {
00394             subsetNodeTable = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00395         } else {
00396             subsetNodeTable = NIL(st_table);
00397         }
00398         subset = BuildSubsetBdd(dd, pathTable, f, info, subsetNodeTable);
00399         if (subset != NULL) {
00400             cuddRef(subset);
00401         }
00402         /* record the number of times a computed result for a node is hit */
00403 
00404 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00405         fprintf(stdout, "Hits = %d, New==Node = %d, NumCalls = %d\n", hits,
00406                thishit, numCalls);
00407 #endif
00408 
00409         if (subsetNodeTable != NIL(st_table)) {
00410             st_free_table(subsetNodeTable);
00411         }
00412         st_free_table(info->maxpathTable);
00413         st_foreach(pathTable, stPathTableDdFree, (char *)dd);
00414 
00415         FREE(info);
00416 
00417     } else {/* if threshold larger than size of dd */
00418         subset = f;
00419         cuddRef(subset);
00420     }
00421     FREE(excess);
00422     st_free_table(pathTable);
00423     FREE(pathLengthArray);
00424     for (i = 0; i <= nodeDistPage; i++) FREE(nodeDistPages[i]);
00425     FREE(nodeDistPages);
00426 
00427 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00428     /* check containment of subset in f */
00429     if (subset != NULL) {
00430         DdNode *check;
00431         check = Cudd_bddIteConstant(dd, subset, f, one);
00432         if (check != one) {
00433             fprintf(stdout, "Wrong partition\n");
00434             exit(-1);
00435         }
00436     }
00437 #endif
00438 
00439     if (subset != NULL) {
00440         cuddDeref(subset);
00441         return(subset);
00442     } else {
00443         return(NULL);
00444     }
00445 
00446 } /* end of cuddSubsetShortPaths */

00453 
00470 static void
00471 ResizeNodeDistPages(
00472    )
00473 {
00474     int i;
00475     NodeDist_t **newNodeDistPages;
00476 
00477     /* move to next page */
00478     nodeDistPage++;
00479 
00480     /* If the current page index is larger than the number of pages
00481      * allocated, allocate a new page array. Page numbers are incremented by 
00482      * INITIAL_PAGES
00483      */
00484     if (nodeDistPage == maxNodeDistPages) {
00485         newNodeDistPages = ALLOC(NodeDist_t *,maxNodeDistPages + INITIAL_PAGES);
00486         if (newNodeDistPages == NULL) {
00487             for (i = 0; i < nodeDistPage; i++) FREE(nodeDistPages[i]);
00488             FREE(nodeDistPages);
00489             memOut = 1;
00490             return;
00491         } else {
00492             for (i = 0; i < maxNodeDistPages; i++) {
00493                 newNodeDistPages[i] = nodeDistPages[i];
00494             }
00495             /* Increase total page count */
00496             maxNodeDistPages += INITIAL_PAGES;
00497             FREE(nodeDistPages);
00498             nodeDistPages = newNodeDistPages;
00499         }
00500     }
00501     /* Allocate a new page */
00502     currentNodeDistPage = nodeDistPages[nodeDistPage] = ALLOC(NodeDist_t,
00503                                                               nodeDistPageSize);
00504     if (currentNodeDistPage == NULL) {
00505         for (i = 0; i < nodeDistPage; i++) FREE(nodeDistPages[i]);
00506         FREE(nodeDistPages);
00507         memOut = 1;
00508         return;
00509     }
00510     /* reset page index */
00511     nodeDistPageIndex = 0;
00512     return;
00513 
00514 } /* end of ResizeNodeDistPages */
00515 
00516 
00533 static void
00534 ResizeQueuePages(
00535    )
00536 {
00537     int i;
00538     DdNode ***newQueuePages;
00539 
00540     queuePage++;
00541     /* If the current page index is larger than the number of pages
00542      * allocated, allocate a new page array. Page numbers are incremented by 
00543      * INITIAL_PAGES
00544      */
00545     if (queuePage == maxQueuePages) {
00546         newQueuePages = ALLOC(DdNode **,maxQueuePages + INITIAL_PAGES);
00547         if (newQueuePages == NULL) {
00548             for (i = 0; i < queuePage; i++) FREE(queuePages[i]);
00549             FREE(queuePages);
00550             memOut = 1;
00551             return;
00552         } else {
00553             for (i = 0; i < maxQueuePages; i++) {
00554                 newQueuePages[i] = queuePages[i];
00555             }
00556             /* Increase total page count */
00557             maxQueuePages += INITIAL_PAGES;
00558             FREE(queuePages);
00559             queuePages = newQueuePages;
00560         }
00561     }
00562     /* Allocate a new page */
00563     currentQueuePage = queuePages[queuePage] = ALLOC(DdNode *,queuePageSize);
00564     if (currentQueuePage == NULL) {
00565         for (i = 0; i < queuePage; i++) FREE(queuePages[i]);
00566         FREE(queuePages);
00567         memOut = 1;
00568         return;
00569     }
00570     /* reset page index */
00571     queuePageIndex = 0;
00572     return;
00573 
00574 } /* end of ResizeQueuePages */
00575 
00576 
00595 static void
00596 CreateTopDist(
00597   st_table * pathTable /* hast table to store path lengths */,
00598   int  parentPage /* the pointer to the page on which the first parent in the queue is to be found. */,
00599   int  parentQueueIndex /* pointer to the first parent on the page */,
00600   int  topLen /* current distance from the root */,
00601   DdNode ** childPage /* pointer to the page on which the first child is to be added. */,
00602   int  childQueueIndex /* pointer to the first child */,
00603   int  numParents /* number of parents to process in this recursive call */)
00604 {
00605     NodeDist_t *nodeStat;
00606     DdNode *N, *Nv, *Nnv, *node, *child, *regChild;
00607     int  i;
00608     int processingDone, childrenCount;
00609 
00610 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00611     numCalls++;
00612 
00613     /* assume this procedure comes in with only the root node*/
00614     /* set queue index to the next available entry for addition */
00615     /* set queue page to page of addition */
00616     if ((queuePages[parentPage] == childPage) && (parentQueueIndex ==
00617                                                   childQueueIndex)) {
00618         fprintf(stderr, "Shouldnt happen that they are equal\n");
00619     }
00620     assert(queuePageIndex == childQueueIndex);
00621     assert(currentQueuePage == childPage);
00622 #endif
00623     /* number children added to queue is initialized , needed for
00624      * numParents in the next call 
00625      */
00626     childrenCount = 0;
00627     /* process all the nodes in this level */
00628     while (numParents) {
00629         numParents--;
00630         if (parentQueueIndex == queuePageSize) {
00631             parentPage++;
00632             parentQueueIndex = 0;
00633         }
00634         /* a parent to process */
00635         node = *(queuePages[parentPage] + parentQueueIndex);
00636         parentQueueIndex++;
00637         /* get its children */
00638         N = Cudd_Regular(node);
00639         Nv = Cudd_T(N);
00640         Nnv = Cudd_E(N);
00641 
00642         Nv = Cudd_NotCond(Nv, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
00643         Nnv = Cudd_NotCond(Nnv, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
00644 
00645         processingDone = 2;
00646         while (processingDone) {
00647             /* processing the THEN and the ELSE children, the THEN
00648              * child first
00649              */
00650             if (processingDone == 2) {
00651                 child = Nv;
00652             } else {
00653                 child = Nnv;
00654             }
00655 
00656             regChild = Cudd_Regular(child);
00657             /* dont process if the child is a constant */
00658             if (!Cudd_IsConstant(child)) {
00659                 /* check is already visited, if not add a new entry in
00660                  * the path Table
00661                  */
00662                 if (!st_lookup(pathTable, (char *)regChild, (char **)&nodeStat)) {
00663                     /* if not in table, has never been visited */
00664                     /* create entry for table */
00665                     if (nodeDistPageIndex == nodeDistPageSize)
00666                         ResizeNodeDistPages();
00667                     if (memOut) {
00668                         for (i = 0; i <= queuePage; i++) FREE(queuePages[i]);
00669                         FREE(queuePages);
00670                         st_free_table(pathTable);
00671                         return;
00672                     }
00673                     /* New entry for child in path Table is created here */
00674                     nodeStat = currentNodeDistPage + nodeDistPageIndex;
00675                     nodeDistPageIndex++;
00676 
00677                     /* Initialize fields of the node data */
00678                     nodeStat->oddTopDist = MAXSHORTINT;
00679                     nodeStat->evenTopDist = MAXSHORTINT;
00680                     nodeStat->evenBotDist = MAXSHORTINT;
00681                     nodeStat->oddBotDist = MAXSHORTINT;
00682                     nodeStat->regResult = NULL;
00683                     nodeStat->compResult = NULL;
00684                     /* update the table entry element, the distance keeps
00685                      * track of the parity of the path from the root
00686                      */
00687                     if (Cudd_IsComplement(child)) {
00688                         nodeStat->oddTopDist = (DdHalfWord) topLen + 1;
00689                     } else {
00690                         nodeStat->evenTopDist = (DdHalfWord) topLen + 1;
00691                     }
00692 
00693                     /* insert entry element for  child in the table */
00694                     if (st_insert(pathTable, (char *)regChild,
00695                                   (char *)nodeStat) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00696                         memOut = 1;
00697                         for (i = 0; i <= nodeDistPage; i++)
00698                             FREE(nodeDistPages[i]);
00699                         FREE(nodeDistPages);
00700                         for (i = 0; i <= queuePage; i++) FREE(queuePages[i]);
00701                         FREE(queuePages);
00702                         st_free_table(pathTable);
00703                         return;
00704                     }
00705 
00706                     /* Create list element for this child to process its children.
00707                      * If this node has been processed already, then it appears
00708                      * in the path table and hence is never added to the list
00709                      * again.
00710                      */
00711 
00712                     if (queuePageIndex == queuePageSize) ResizeQueuePages();
00713                     if (memOut) {
00714                         for (i = 0; i <= nodeDistPage; i++)
00715                             FREE(nodeDistPages[i]);
00716                         FREE(nodeDistPages);
00717                         st_free_table(pathTable);
00718                         return;
00719                     }
00720                     *(currentQueuePage + queuePageIndex) = child;
00721                     queuePageIndex++;
00722 
00723                     childrenCount++;
00724                 } else {
00725                     /* if not been met in a path with this parity before */
00726                     /* put in list */
00727                     if (((Cudd_IsComplement(child)) && (nodeStat->oddTopDist ==
00728                           MAXSHORTINT)) || ((!Cudd_IsComplement(child)) &&
00729                                   (nodeStat->evenTopDist == MAXSHORTINT))) {
00730 
00731                         if (queuePageIndex == queuePageSize) ResizeQueuePages();
00732                         if (memOut) {
00733                             for (i = 0; i <= nodeDistPage; i++)
00734                                 FREE(nodeDistPages[i]);
00735                             FREE(nodeDistPages);
00736                             st_free_table(pathTable);
00737                             return;
00738 
00739                         }
00740                         *(currentQueuePage + queuePageIndex) = child;
00741                         queuePageIndex++;
00742 
00743                         /* update the distance with the appropriate parity */
00744                         if (Cudd_IsComplement(child)) {
00745                             nodeStat->oddTopDist = (DdHalfWord) topLen + 1;
00746                         } else {
00747                             nodeStat->evenTopDist = (DdHalfWord) topLen + 1;
00748                         }
00749                         childrenCount++;
00750                     }
00751 
00752                 } /* end of else (not found in st_table) */
00753             } /*end of if Not constant child */
00754             processingDone--;
00755         } /*end of while processing Nv, Nnv */
00756     }  /*end of while numParents */
00757 
00758 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00759     assert(queuePages[parentPage] == childPage);
00760     assert(parentQueueIndex == childQueueIndex);
00761 #endif
00762 
00763     if (childrenCount != 0) {
00764         topLen++;
00765         childPage = currentQueuePage;
00766         childQueueIndex = queuePageIndex;
00767         CreateTopDist(pathTable, parentPage, parentQueueIndex, topLen,
00768                       childPage, childQueueIndex, childrenCount);
00769     }
00770 
00771     return;
00772 
00773 } /* end of CreateTopDist */
00774 
00775 
00795 static void
00796 CreateBotDist(
00797   DdNode * node /* current node */,
00798   st_table * pathTable /* path table with path lengths */,
00799   unsigned int * pathLengthArray /* array that stores number of nodes belonging to a particular path length. */)
00800 {
00801     DdNode *N, *Nv, *Nnv;
00802     DdNode *realChild;
00803     DdNode *child, *regChild;
00804     NodeDist_t *nodeStat, *nodeStatChild;
00805     unsigned int  oddLen, evenLen, pathLength;
00806     DdHalfWord botDist;
00807     int processingDone;
00808 
00809     if (Cudd_IsConstant(node))
00810         return;
00811     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
00812     /* each node has one table entry */
00813     /* update as you go down the min dist of each node from
00814        the root in each (odd and even) parity */
00815     if (!st_lookup(pathTable, (char *)N, (char **)&nodeStat)) {
00816         fprintf(stderr, "Something wrong, the entry doesn't exist\n");
00817         exit(-1);
00818     }
00819 
00820     /* compute length of odd parity distances */
00821     if ((nodeStat->oddTopDist != MAXSHORTINT) &&
00822         (nodeStat->oddBotDist != MAXSHORTINT))
00823         oddLen = (nodeStat->oddTopDist + nodeStat->oddBotDist);
00824     else
00825         oddLen = MAXSHORTINT;
00826 
00827     /* compute length of even parity distances */
00828     if (!((nodeStat->evenTopDist == MAXSHORTINT) ||
00829           (nodeStat->evenBotDist == MAXSHORTINT)))
00830         evenLen = (nodeStat->evenTopDist +nodeStat->evenBotDist);
00831     else
00832         evenLen = MAXSHORTINT;
00833 
00834     /* assign pathlength to minimum of the two */
00835     pathLength = (oddLen <= evenLen) ? oddLen : evenLen;
00836 
00837     Nv = Cudd_T(N);
00838     Nnv = Cudd_E(N);
00839 
00840     /* process each child */
00841     processingDone = 0;
00842     while (processingDone != 2) {
00843         if (!processingDone) {
00844             child = Nv;
00845         } else {
00846             child = Nnv;
00847         }
00848 
00849         realChild = Cudd_NotCond(child, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
00850         regChild = Cudd_Regular(child);
00851         if (Cudd_IsConstant(realChild)) {
00852             /* found a minterm, count parity and shortest distance
00853              * from the constant
00854              */
00855             if (Cudd_IsComplement(child))
00856                 nodeStat->oddBotDist = 1;
00857             else
00858                 nodeStat->evenBotDist = 1;
00859 
00860         } else { 
00861 
00862             /* if node not in table, recur */
00863             if (!st_lookup(pathTable, (char *) regChild,
00864                            (char **)&nodeStatChild)) {
00865                 fprintf(stderr, "Something wrong, node in table should have been created in top dist proc.\n");
00866                 exit(-1);
00867             }
00868 
00869             if (nodeStatChild->oddBotDist == MAXSHORTINT) {
00870                 if (nodeStatChild->evenBotDist == MAXSHORTINT) {
00871                     CreateBotDist(realChild, pathTable, pathLengthArray);
00872                 } else {
00873                     fprintf(stderr, "Something wrong, both bot nodeStats should be there\n");
00874                     exit(-1);
00875                 }
00876             }
00877             /* update shortest distance from the constant depending on
00878                parity */
00879 
00880             if (Cudd_IsComplement(child)) {
00881                 /* if parity on the edge then add 1 to even distance
00882                  *  of child to get odd parity distance and add 1 to odd distance
00883                  *  of child to get even parity distance Change distance of
00884                  *  current node only if the calculated distance is lesser than
00885                  *  existing distance,
00886                  */
00887                 if (nodeStatChild->oddBotDist != MAXSHORTINT)
00888                     botDist = nodeStatChild->oddBotDist + 1;
00889                 else
00890                     botDist = MAXSHORTINT;
00891                 if (nodeStat->evenBotDist > botDist )
00892                     nodeStat->evenBotDist = botDist;
00893 
00894                 if (nodeStatChild->evenBotDist != MAXSHORTINT)
00895                     botDist = nodeStatChild->evenBotDist + 1;
00896                 else
00897                     botDist = MAXSHORTINT;
00898                 if (nodeStat->oddBotDist > botDist)
00899                     nodeStat->oddBotDist = botDist;
00900 
00901             } else {
00902                 /* if parity on the edge then add 1 to even distance
00903                  * of child to get even parity distance and add 1 to odd distance
00904                  * of child to get odd parity distance Change distance of current
00905                  * node only if the calculated distance is lesser than existing
00906                  * distance,
00907                  */
00908                 if (nodeStatChild->evenBotDist != MAXSHORTINT)
00909                     botDist = nodeStatChild->evenBotDist + 1;
00910                 else
00911                     botDist = MAXSHORTINT;
00912                 if (nodeStat->evenBotDist > botDist)
00913                     nodeStat->evenBotDist = botDist;
00914 
00915                 if (nodeStatChild->oddBotDist != MAXSHORTINT)
00916                     botDist = nodeStatChild->oddBotDist + 1;
00917                 else
00918                     botDist = MAXSHORTINT;
00919                 if (nodeStat->oddBotDist > botDist)
00920                     nodeStat->oddBotDist = botDist;
00921             }
00922         } /* end of else (if not constant child ) */
00923         processingDone++;
00924     } /* end of while processing Nv, Nnv */
00925 
00926     /* compute shortest path length on the fly */
00927     if ((nodeStat->oddTopDist != MAXSHORTINT) &&
00928         (nodeStat->oddBotDist != MAXSHORTINT))
00929         oddLen = (nodeStat->oddTopDist + nodeStat->oddBotDist);
00930     else
00931         oddLen = MAXSHORTINT;
00932 
00933     if ((nodeStat->evenTopDist != MAXSHORTINT) &&
00934         (nodeStat->evenBotDist != MAXSHORTINT))
00935         evenLen = (nodeStat->evenTopDist +nodeStat->evenBotDist);
00936     else
00937         evenLen = MAXSHORTINT;
00938 
00939     /* update path length array that has number of nodes of a particular
00940        path length */
00941     if (oddLen < pathLength ) {
00942         if (pathLength != MAXSHORTINT)
00943             pathLengthArray[pathLength]--;
00944         if (oddLen != MAXSHORTINT)
00945             pathLengthArray[oddLen]++;
00946         pathLength = oddLen;
00947     }
00948     if (evenLen < pathLength ) {
00949         if (pathLength != MAXSHORTINT)
00950             pathLengthArray[pathLength]--;
00951         if (evenLen != MAXSHORTINT)
00952             pathLengthArray[evenLen]++;
00953     }
00954 
00955     return;
00956 
00957 } /*end of CreateBotDist */
00958 
00959 
00978 static st_table *
00979 CreatePathTable(
00980   DdNode * node /* root of function */,
00981   unsigned int * pathLengthArray /* array of path lengths to store nodes labeled with the various path lengths */)
00982 {
00983 
00984     st_table *pathTable;
00985     NodeDist_t *nodeStat;
00986     DdHalfWord topLen;
00987     DdNode *N;
00988     int i, numParents;
00989     int insertValue;
00990     DdNode **childPage;
00991     int parentPage;
00992     int childQueueIndex, parentQueueIndex;
00993 
00994     /* Creating path Table for storing data about nodes */
00995     pathTable = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp,st_ptrhash);
00996 
00997     /* initializing pages for info about each node */
00998     maxNodeDistPages = INITIAL_PAGES;
00999     nodeDistPages = ALLOC(NodeDist_t *, maxNodeDistPages);
01000     if (nodeDistPages == NULL) {
01001         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01002     }
01003     nodeDistPage = 0;
01004     currentNodeDistPage = nodeDistPages[nodeDistPage] =
01005         ALLOC(NodeDist_t, nodeDistPageSize);
01006     if (currentNodeDistPage == NULL) {
01007         for (i = 0; i <= nodeDistPage; i++) FREE(nodeDistPages[i]);
01008         FREE(nodeDistPages);
01009         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01010     }
01011     nodeDistPageIndex = 0;
01012 
01013     /* initializing pages for the BFS search queue, implemented as an array */
01014     maxQueuePages = INITIAL_PAGES;
01015     queuePages = ALLOC(DdNode **, maxQueuePages);
01016     if (queuePages == NULL) {
01017         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01018     }
01019     queuePage = 0;
01020     currentQueuePage  = queuePages[queuePage] = ALLOC(DdNode *, queuePageSize);
01021     if (currentQueuePage == NULL) {
01022         for (i = 0; i <= queuePage; i++) FREE(queuePages[i]);
01023         FREE(queuePages);
01024         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01025     }
01026     queuePageIndex = 0;
01027 
01028     /* enter the root node into the queue to start with */
01029     parentPage = queuePage;
01030     parentQueueIndex = queuePageIndex;
01031     topLen = 0;
01032     *(currentQueuePage + queuePageIndex) = node;
01033     queuePageIndex++;
01034     childPage = currentQueuePage;
01035     childQueueIndex = queuePageIndex;
01036 
01037     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
01038 
01039     if (nodeDistPageIndex == nodeDistPageSize) ResizeNodeDistPages();
01040     if (memOut) {
01041         for (i = 0; i <= nodeDistPage; i++) FREE(nodeDistPages[i]);
01042         FREE(nodeDistPages);
01043         for (i = 0; i <= queuePage; i++) FREE(queuePages[i]);
01044         FREE(queuePages);
01045         st_free_table(pathTable);
01046         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01047     }
01048 
01049     nodeStat = currentNodeDistPage + nodeDistPageIndex;
01050     nodeDistPageIndex++;
01051 
01052     nodeStat->oddTopDist = MAXSHORTINT;
01053     nodeStat->evenTopDist = MAXSHORTINT;
01054     nodeStat->evenBotDist = MAXSHORTINT;
01055     nodeStat->oddBotDist = MAXSHORTINT;
01056     nodeStat->regResult = NULL;
01057     nodeStat->compResult = NULL;
01058 
01059     insertValue = st_insert(pathTable, (char *)N, (char *)nodeStat);
01060     if (insertValue == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
01061         memOut = 1;
01062         for (i = 0; i <= nodeDistPage; i++) FREE(nodeDistPages[i]);
01063         FREE(nodeDistPages);
01064         for (i = 0; i <= queuePage; i++) FREE(queuePages[i]);
01065         FREE(queuePages);
01066         st_free_table(pathTable);
01067         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01068     } else if (insertValue == 1) {
01069         fprintf(stderr, "Something wrong, the entry exists but didnt show up in st_lookup\n");
01070         exit(-1);
01071     }
01072 
01073     if (Cudd_IsComplement(node)) {
01074         nodeStat->oddTopDist = 0;
01075     } else {
01076         nodeStat->evenTopDist = 0;
01077     }
01078     numParents = 1;
01079     /* call the function that counts the distance of each node from the
01080      * root
01081      */
01082 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01083     numCalls = 0;
01084 #endif
01085     CreateTopDist(pathTable, parentPage, parentQueueIndex, (int) topLen,
01086                   childPage, childQueueIndex, numParents);
01087     if (memOut) {
01088         fprintf(stderr, "Out of Memory and cant count path lengths\n");
01089         goto OUT_OF_MEM;
01090     }
01091 
01092 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01093     numCalls = 0;
01094 #endif
01095     /* call the function that counts the distance of each node from the
01096      * constant
01097      */
01098     CreateBotDist(node, pathTable, pathLengthArray);
01099 
01100     /* free BFS queue pages as no longer required */
01101     for (i = 0; i <= queuePage; i++) FREE(queuePages[i]);
01102     FREE(queuePages);
01103     return (pathTable);
01104 
01105 OUT_OF_MEM:
01106     (void)fprintf(stderr, "Out of Memory, cant allocate pages\n");
01107     memOut = 1;
01108     return NULL;
01109 } /*end of CreatePathTable */
01110 
01111 
01128 static unsigned int
01129 AssessPathLength(
01130   unsigned int * pathLengthArray /* array determining number of nodes belonging to the different path lengths */,
01131   int  threshold /* threshold to determine maximum allowable nodes in the subset */,
01132   int  numVars /* maximum number of variables */,
01133   unsigned int * excess /* number of nodes labeled maxpath required in the subset */)
01134 {
01135     unsigned int i, maxpath;
01136     int temp;
01137 
01138     temp = threshold;
01139     i = 0;
01140     maxpath = 0;
01141     /* quit loop if i reaches max number of variables or if temp reaches
01142      * below zero
01143      */
01144     while ((i < (unsigned) numVars+1) && (temp > 0)) {
01145         if (pathLengthArray[i] > 0) {
01146             maxpath = i;
01147             temp = temp - pathLengthArray[i];
01148         }
01149         i++;
01150     }
01151     /* if all nodes of max path are needed */
01152     if (temp >= 0) {
01153         maxpath++; /* now maxpath  becomes the next maxppath or max number
01154                       of variables */
01155         *excess = 0;
01156     } else { /* normal case when subset required is less than size of
01157                 original BDD */
01158         *excess = temp + pathLengthArray[maxpath];
01159     }
01160 
01161     if (!maxpath) {
01162         fprintf(stderr, "Path Length array seems to be all zeroes, check\n");
01163     }
01164     return(maxpath);
01165 } /* end of AssessPathLength */
01166 
01167 
01210 static DdNode *
01211 BuildSubsetBdd(
01212   DdManager * dd /* DD manager */,
01213   st_table * pathTable /* path table with path lengths and computed results */,
01214   DdNode * node /* current node */,
01215   struct AssortedInfo * info /* assorted information structure */,
01216   st_table * subsetNodeTable /* table storing computed results */)
01217 {
01218     DdNode *N, *Nv, *Nnv;
01219     DdNode *ThenBranch, *ElseBranch, *childBranch;
01220     DdNode *child, *regChild, *regNnv = NULL, *regNv = NULL;
01221     NodeDist_t *nodeStatNv, *nodeStat, *nodeStatNnv;
01222     DdNode *neW, *topv, *regNew;
01223     char *entry;
01224     unsigned int topid;
01225     unsigned int childPathLength, oddLen, evenLen, NnvPathLength = 0,
01226       NvPathLength = 0;
01227     unsigned int NvBotDist, NnvBotDist;
01228     int tiebreakChild;
01229     int  processingDone, thenDone, elseDone;
01230 
01231 
01232 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01233     numCalls++;
01234 #endif
01235     if (Cudd_IsConstant(node))
01236         return(node);
01237 
01238     N = Cudd_Regular(node);
01239     /* find node in table */
01240     if (!st_lookup(pathTable, (char *)N, (char **)&nodeStat)) {
01241         fprintf(stderr, "Something wrong, node must be in table \n");
01242         exit(-1);
01243     }
01244     /* if the node in the table has been visited, then return the corresponding
01245      * Dd Since a node can become a subset of itself, its
01246      * complement(that is te same node reached by a different parity0 will
01247      * become a superset of the original node and result in some minterms
01248      * that werent in the original set. Hence two different results are
01249      * maintained, corresponding to the odd and even parities
01250      */
01251 
01252     /* if this node is reached with an odd parity, get odd parity results */
01253     if (Cudd_IsComplement(node)) {
01254         if  (nodeStat->compResult != NULL) {
01255 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01256             hits++;
01257 #endif
01258             return(nodeStat->compResult);
01259         }
01260     } else {
01261         /* if this node is reached with an even parity, get even parity
01262          * results
01263          */
01264         if (nodeStat->regResult != NULL) {
01265 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01266             hits++;
01267 #endif
01268             return(nodeStat->regResult);
01269         }
01270     }
01271 
01272 
01273     /* get children */
01274     Nv = Cudd_T(N);
01275     Nnv = Cudd_E(N);
01276 
01277     Nv = Cudd_NotCond(Nv, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01278     Nnv = Cudd_NotCond(Nnv, Cudd_IsComplement(node));
01279 
01280     /* no child processed */
01281     processingDone = 0;
01282     /* then child not processed */
01283     thenDone = 0;
01284     ThenBranch = NULL;
01285     /* else child not processed */
01286     elseDone = 0;
01287     ElseBranch = NULL;
01288     /* if then child constant, branch is the child */
01289     if (Cudd_IsConstant(Nv)) {
01290         /*shortest path found */
01291         if ((Nv == DD_ONE(dd)) && (info->findShortestPath)) {
01292             info->findShortestPath = 0;
01293         }
01294 
01295         ThenBranch = Nv;
01296         cuddRef(ThenBranch);
01297         if (ThenBranch == NULL) {
01298             return(NULL);
01299         }
01300 
01301         thenDone++;
01302         processingDone++;
01303         NvBotDist = MAXSHORTINT;
01304     } else {
01305         /* derive regular child for table lookup */
01306         regNv = Cudd_Regular(Nv);
01307         /* get node data for shortest path length */
01308 
01309         if (!st_lookup(pathTable, (char *)regNv, (char **)&nodeStatNv) ) {
01310             fprintf(stderr, "Something wrong, node must be in table \n");
01311             exit(-1);
01312         }
01313         /* derive shortest path length for  child */
01314         if ((nodeStatNv->oddTopDist != MAXSHORTINT) &&
01315             (nodeStatNv->oddBotDist != MAXSHORTINT)) {
01316             oddLen = (nodeStatNv->oddTopDist + nodeStatNv->oddBotDist);
01317         } else {
01318             oddLen = MAXSHORTINT;
01319         }
01320 
01321         if ((nodeStatNv->evenTopDist != MAXSHORTINT) &&
01322             (nodeStatNv->evenBotDist != MAXSHORTINT)) {
01323             evenLen = (nodeStatNv->evenTopDist +nodeStatNv->evenBotDist);
01324         } else {
01325             evenLen = MAXSHORTINT;
01326         }
01327 
01328         NvPathLength = (oddLen <= evenLen) ? oddLen : evenLen;
01329         NvBotDist = (oddLen <= evenLen) ? nodeStatNv->oddBotDist:
01330                                                    nodeStatNv->evenBotDist;
01331     }
01332     /* if else child constant, branch is the child */
01333     if (Cudd_IsConstant(Nnv)) {
01334         /*shortest path found */
01335         if ((Nnv == DD_ONE(dd)) && (info->findShortestPath)) {
01336             info->findShortestPath = 0;
01337         }
01338 
01339         ElseBranch = Nnv;
01340         cuddRef(ElseBranch);
01341         if (ElseBranch == NULL) {
01342             return(NULL);
01343         }
01344 
01345         elseDone++;
01346         processingDone++;
01347         NnvBotDist = MAXSHORTINT;
01348     } else {
01349         /* derive regular child for table lookup */
01350         regNnv = Cudd_Regular(Nnv);
01351         /* get node data for shortest path length */
01352         if (!st_lookup(pathTable, (char *)regNnv, (char **)&nodeStatNnv) ) {
01353             fprintf(stderr, "Something wrong, node must be in table \n");
01354             exit(-1);
01355         }
01356         /* derive shortest path length for  child */
01357         if ((nodeStatNnv->oddTopDist != MAXSHORTINT) &&
01358             (nodeStatNnv->oddBotDist != MAXSHORTINT)) {
01359             oddLen = (nodeStatNnv->oddTopDist + nodeStatNnv->oddBotDist);
01360         } else {
01361             oddLen = MAXSHORTINT;
01362         }
01363 
01364         if ((nodeStatNnv->evenTopDist != MAXSHORTINT) &&
01365             (nodeStatNnv->evenBotDist != MAXSHORTINT)) {
01366             evenLen = (nodeStatNnv->evenTopDist +nodeStatNnv->evenBotDist);
01367         } else {
01368             evenLen = MAXSHORTINT;
01369         }
01370 
01371         NnvPathLength = (oddLen <= evenLen) ? oddLen : evenLen;
01372         NnvBotDist = (oddLen <= evenLen) ? nodeStatNnv->oddBotDist :
01373                                                    nodeStatNnv->evenBotDist;
01374     }
01375 
01376     tiebreakChild = (NvBotDist <= NnvBotDist) ? 1 : 0;
01377     /* while both children not processed */
01378     while (processingDone != 2) {
01379         if (!processingDone) {
01380             /* if no child processed */
01381             /* pick the child with shortest path length and record which one
01382              * picked
01383              */
01384             if ((NvPathLength < NnvPathLength) ||
01385                 ((NvPathLength == NnvPathLength) && (tiebreakChild == 1))) {
01386                 child = Nv;
01387                 regChild = regNv;
01388                 thenDone = 1;
01389                 childPathLength = NvPathLength;
01390             } else {
01391                 child = Nnv;
01392                 regChild = regNnv;
01393                 elseDone = 1;
01394                 childPathLength = NnvPathLength;
01395             } /* then path length less than else path length */
01396         } else {
01397             /* if one child processed, process the other */
01398             if (thenDone) {
01399                 child = Nnv;
01400                 regChild = regNnv;
01401                 elseDone = 1;
01402                 childPathLength = NnvPathLength;
01403             } else {
01404                 child = Nv;
01405                 regChild = regNv;
01406                 thenDone = 1;
01407                 childPathLength = NvPathLength;
01408             } /* end of else pick the Then child if ELSE child processed */
01409         } /* end of else one child has been processed */
01410 
01411         /* ignore (replace with constant 0) all nodes which lie on paths larger
01412          * than the maximum length of the path required
01413          */
01414         if (childPathLength > info->maxpath) {
01415             /* record nodes visited */
01416             childBranch = zero;
01417         } else {
01418             if (childPathLength < info->maxpath) {
01419                 if (info->findShortestPath) {
01420                     info->findShortestPath = 0;
01421                 }
01422                 childBranch = BuildSubsetBdd(dd, pathTable, child, info,
01423                                              subsetNodeTable);
01424 
01425             } else { /* Case: path length of node = maxpath*/
01426                 /* if the node labeled with maxpath is found in the maxpathTable,
01427                  * use it to build the subset BDD.
01428                  */
01429                 if (st_lookup(info->maxpathTable, (char *)regChild,
01430                               (char **)&entry)) {
01431                     /* when a node that is already been chosen is hit, the quest
01432                      * for a complete path is over
01433                      */
01434                     if (info->findShortestPath) {
01435                         info->findShortestPath = 0;
01436                     }
01437                     childBranch = BuildSubsetBdd(dd, pathTable, child, info,
01438                                                  subsetNodeTable);
01439 
01440                 } else {
01441                     /* if node is not found in the maxpathTable and the threshold
01442                      * has been reached, then if the path needs to be completed,
01443                      * continue. Else replace the node with a zero.
01444                      */
01445 
01446                     if (info->thresholdReached <= 0) {
01447                         if (info->findShortestPath) {
01448                             if (st_insert(info->maxpathTable, (char *)regChild,
01449                                           (char *)NIL(char)) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
01450                                 memOut = 1;
01451                                 fprintf(stderr, "OUT of memory\n");
01452                                 info->thresholdReached = 0;
01453                                 childBranch = zero;
01454 
01455                             } else {
01456                                 info->thresholdReached--;
01457                                 childBranch = BuildSubsetBdd(dd, pathTable,
01458                                                     child, info,subsetNodeTable);
01459                             }
01460                         } else { /* not find shortest path, we dont need this
01461                                     node */
01462                             childBranch = zero;
01463                         }
01464                     } else { /* threshold hasn't been reached , need
01465                                 the node */
01466                         if (st_insert(info->maxpathTable, (char *)regChild,
01467                                       (char *)NIL(char)) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
01468                             memOut = 1;
01469                             fprintf(stderr, "OUT of memory\n");
01470                             info->thresholdReached = 0;
01471                             childBranch = zero;
01472                         } else {
01473                             info->thresholdReached--;
01474                             if (info->thresholdReached <= 0) {
01475                                 info->findShortestPath = 1;
01476                             }
01477                             childBranch = BuildSubsetBdd(dd, pathTable,
01478                                                  child, info, subsetNodeTable);
01479 
01480                         } /* end of st_insert successful */
01481                     } /* end of threshold hasnt been reached yet */
01482                 } /* end of else node not found in maxpath table */
01483             } /* end of if (path length of node = maxpath) */
01484         } /* end if !(childPathLength > maxpath) */
01485         if (childBranch == NULL) {
01486             /* deref other stuff incase reordering has taken place */
01487             if (ThenBranch != NULL) {
01488                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, ThenBranch);
01489                 ThenBranch = NULL;
01490             }
01491             if (ElseBranch != NULL) {
01492                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, ElseBranch);
01493                 ElseBranch = NULL;
01494             }
01495             return(NULL);
01496         }
01497 
01498         cuddRef(childBranch);
01499 
01500         if (child == Nv) {
01501             ThenBranch = childBranch;
01502         } else {
01503             ElseBranch = childBranch;
01504         }
01505         processingDone++;
01506 
01507     } /*end of while processing Nv, Nnv */      
01508 
01509     info->findShortestPath = 0;
01510     topid = Cudd_NodeReadIndex(N);
01511     topv = Cudd_ReadVars(dd, topid);
01512     cuddRef(topv);
01513     neW = cuddBddIteRecur(dd, topv, ThenBranch, ElseBranch);
01514     if (neW != NULL) {
01515         cuddRef(neW);
01516     }
01517     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, topv);
01518     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, ThenBranch);
01519     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, ElseBranch);
01520 
01521 
01522     /* Hard Limit of threshold has been imposed */
01523     if (subsetNodeTable != NIL(st_table)) {
01524         /* check if a new node is created */
01525         regNew = Cudd_Regular(neW);
01526         /* subset node table keeps all new nodes that have been created to keep
01527          * a running count of how many nodes have been built in the subset.
01528          */
01529         if (!st_lookup(subsetNodeTable, (char *)regNew, (char **)&entry)) {
01530             if (!Cudd_IsConstant(regNew)) {
01531                 if (st_insert(subsetNodeTable, (char *)regNew,
01532                               (char *)NULL) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
01533                     fprintf(stderr, "Out of memory\n");
01534                     return (NULL);
01535                 }
01536                 if (st_count(subsetNodeTable) > info->threshold) {
01537                     info->thresholdReached = 0;
01538                 }
01539             }
01540         }
01541     }
01542 
01543 
01544     if (neW == NULL) {
01545         return(NULL);
01546     } else {
01547         /*store computed result in regular form*/
01548         if (Cudd_IsComplement(node)) {
01549             nodeStat->compResult = neW;
01550             cuddRef(nodeStat->compResult);
01551             /* if the new node is the same as the corresponding node in the
01552              * original bdd then its complement need not be computed as it
01553              * cannot be larger than the node itself
01554              */
01555             if (neW == node) {
01556 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01557                 thishit++;
01558 #endif
01559                 /* if a result for the node has already been computed, then
01560                  * it can only be smaller than teh node itself. hence store
01561                  * the node result in order not to break recombination
01562                  */
01563                 if (nodeStat->regResult != NULL) {
01564                     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, nodeStat->regResult);
01565                 }
01566                 nodeStat->regResult = Cudd_Not(neW);
01567                 cuddRef(nodeStat->regResult);
01568             }
01569 
01570         } else {
01571             nodeStat->regResult = neW;
01572             cuddRef(nodeStat->regResult);
01573             if (neW == node) {
01574 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01575                 thishit++;
01576 #endif
01577                 if (nodeStat->compResult != NULL) {
01578                     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, nodeStat->compResult);
01579                 }
01580                 nodeStat->compResult = Cudd_Not(neW);
01581                 cuddRef(nodeStat->compResult);
01582             }
01583         } 
01584 
01585         cuddDeref(neW);
01586         return(neW);
01587     } /* end of else i.e. Subset != NULL */
01588 } /* end of BuildSubsetBdd */
01589 
01590 
01602 static enum st_retval
01603 stPathTableDdFree(
01604   char * key,
01605   char * value,
01606   char * arg)
01607 {
01608     NodeDist_t *nodeStat;
01609     DdManager *dd;
01610 
01611     nodeStat = (NodeDist_t *)value;
01612     dd = (DdManager *)arg;
01613     if (nodeStat->regResult != NULL) {
01614         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, nodeStat->regResult);
01615     }
01616     if (nodeStat->compResult != NULL) {
01617         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, nodeStat->compResult);
01618     }
01619     return(ST_CONTINUE);
01620 
01621 } /* end of stPathTableFree */
